text: Bus Stop permanently closed
This bus stop has been removed to accommodate a new pavement for pedestrians or cyclists.  Please use stop 4889 from now on – it is about a 3 minutes walk, on the other side of the traffic lights.
Temporary bus stop closure

From Sunday 21 to Monday 22 May 2023, the following stops are closed daily from 21:00 to the end of the service due to roadworks:

 - stop closed for stop 6327 at Awatere Street for all routes, Use Stop 2215 - Preston Rd/Bairds Rd

Temporary Bus Stop Closure – Great South Road, Manukau

These works will be on and off from Friday 12 to Monday 29 May. Tuesday and Wednesday nights the works will be 8pm to 5am. Weekends, will be from 8pm Friday night to 5am Monday morning.
During these works, the following bus stops will be closed for roadworks:
 • Stop 6748 – AUT Manukau: For 353, use Stop 6563 – Meadowcourt Drive. Others, use Stop 6022 – Caspar Road Shops.
 • Stop 6771 – AUT Manukau: For 353, use Stop 6564 – Meadowcourt Drive. Others, use Temporary Bus Stop at 537 Great South Road.

 • Stop 6025 – Great South Road/Puhinui Road: Use Temporary Bus Stop at 537 Great South Road.

50B Bus Service Temporarily Suspended

Due to bus driver shortages, bus route 50B has been suspended until further notice. 
However, due to a technical error this service is still showing in Journey Planner as cancelled trips.
We hope to reinstate this service as soon as possible, and will notify customers when we have a confirmed date.

Route detoured

Until Saturday 27 July 2023, bus 114 from Hobsonville Point to Westgate will follow a detour via Brigham Creek Rd and Hobsonville Rd due to a road closure on Trig Road between Brigham Creek Rd and Hobsonville Rd. No bus stops will be missed but please expect a longer journey time.
University Graduation Procession

From Tuesday 23 to Friday 23 May, daily from 9:00 am to 12:30 pm, the following stops will be closed to host the university graduation procession on Hurstmere Road, Takapuna:

Stop 3294 - Killarney Street. Use Stop C at Takapuna Transport Centre instead.
Stop 3298 - Anzac Street. Use Stop C at Takapuna Transport Centre instead.
Route 74 detouring

Due to heavy congestion around the Queens Road/Tripoli Road roundabouts in Panmure is causing significant delays to bus route 74. This is mainly caused by the roadworks on Church Crescent which will be in-place until late Sunday 25 June, so delays are expected to reoccur.
Route 74 will be detouring around the area from now until the roadworks are done, missing the following stops:
Stop 7527 - Panmure Town Centre: Use Stop 7525 - Jellicoe Road.
Stop 7530 - Panmure Town Centre: Use Stop 7528 - Jellicoe Road.
Stop 7537 - Caen Road: Use Stop 7539 - Johnston Reserve.
